item.description: **UPDATED** Changed to Sunday due to the travel ban. If somebody lives near the field, please let us know if the parking lot has been plowed so we know for sure if we can play. The side roads are still in rough shape so take that into consideration before heading out. PLEASE RSVP so we can get an accurate head count to ensure we have enough players to make it worth it.  If we don't have 12 confirmed by 11:00 AM the game will be cancelled.  Minus Eli, Tim, Paul and Brett because they are automatically added as RSVP's whenever a new meetup is created.  Please check back here for updates before heading to the field.
item.name: POST- SNOWPOCALYPSE Flag Football Sunday 2/10 12pm
